title: Celebration of life: trees
creator_credit: Paul Fillinger and Paul Fillinger Productions
brief_description: The beauty and wonder of our natural environment gives cause for a celebration. The viewer joins a group of youngsters discovering and enjoying everything about trees and forests. It is a reminder of the people-nature activities that can be enjoyed. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
